New Records: Quinton de Kock scored his 15th T20I half-century.
South Africa set their highest score of the tournament with 194-4.
South Africa achieved their highest powerplay score of the tournament with 64-1.
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 40 deliveries.
Kagiso Rabada took 3 wickets for 18 runs.
Andries Gous scored 80 not out off 47 deliveries.
Rabada dismissed the dangerous Harmeet Singh in the penultimate over.
Heinrich Klaasen and Tristan Stubbs added 53 runs for the fifth wicket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua and Barbuda.
South Africa's next game is against England in Saint Lucia.
A win against England would ensure South Africa has one foot in the T20 World Cup semifinals.
